entry.title: [3] Some Ingenious Algorithms That Are All Around Us
entry.summary: Algorithms are all around us. They are the invisible forces that power our modern world, from the search engines we use to find information to the social networks we use to connect with friends and family. In this post, I will share some ingenious algorithms that are all around us and how they work.
